verses.text:
Oh, stand the storm, it won't be long, We'll an-chor by and by;
Oh, stand the storm, it won't be long, We'll an-chor by and by.

I have a moth-er in the prom-ised land, We'll an-chor by and by;
I have a moth-er in the prom-ised land, We'll an-chor by and by.

Oh, stand the storm, it won't be long, We'll an-chor by and by;
Oh, stand the storm, it won't be long, We'll an-chor by and by.

I have a fa-ther in the prom-ised land, We'll an-chor by and by;
I have a fa-ther in the prom-ised land, We'll an-chor by and by.

chorus.text:
We'll an-chor by and by, We'll an-chor by and by;
Oh, stand the storm, it won't be long, We'll an-chor by and by.
